body_html:
D'oh, it looks like I was missing the specific API level that I had specified in the WORKSPACE file. My bad.

In hindsight the error message is pretty good, though it would be awesome if it said which specific SDK version was missing, e.g. Android SDK version 23 not found. In my case I had almost all the other SDK versions installed, just not the one I had configured in the WORKSPACE file.

I did have the right build tools version installed (showing screenshot here in case it helps future people who find this GitHub issue):

If there's a way I can improve the error message, let me know and I'll PR it (though if that requires a Bazel change then that might be beyond me!).
body_text:
D'oh, it looks like I was missing the specific API level that I had specified in the WORKSPACE file.  My bad.

In hindsight the error message is pretty good, though it would be awesome if it said which specific SDK version was missing, e.g. Android SDK version 23 not found.  In my case I had almost all the other SDK versions installed, just not the one I had configured in the WORKSPACE file.
I did have the right build tools version installed (showing screenshot here in case it helps future people who find this GitHub issue):

If there's a way I can improve the error message, let me know and I'll PR it (though if that requires a Bazel change then that might be beyond me!).
body:
D'oh, it looks like I was missing the specific API level that I had specified in the WORKSPACE file.  My bad.
![screen shot 2017-02-06 at 8 44 56 pm](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/739125/22674827/279d0e66-ecb0-11e6-97a1-5df9de45140b.png)

In hindsight the error message is pretty good, though it would be awesome if it said which specific SDK version was missing, e.g. `Android SDK version 23 not found`.  In my case I had almost all the other SDK versions installed, just not the one I had configured in the WORKSPACE file.

I did have the right build tools version installed (showing screenshot here in case it helps future people who find this GitHub issue):
![screen shot 2017-02-06 at 8 55 46 pm](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/739125/22674842/46c7209c-ecb0-11e6-8749-62cb33351942.png)

If there's a way I can improve the error message, let me know and I'll PR it (though if that requires a Bazel change then that might be beyond me!).
